title: Someone is trying to access my league account, what do.
body:
About 4-5 months ago, i couldnt access my league account. i think someone hacked into it so i changed my email, pass, etc.

Now today, i look im my email and i see that im getting password recovery requests every 5 days. (i got one on the 2nd of may, 25th of april, 20th of april, etc)

What should i do? Change my email? pass?

Is it possible to change your login name on league? (not your summoner name in game)

{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Unfortunately there's not a way to change your login name, but the good news is that unless they have access to your e-mail, they shouldn't be able to do a whole lot by sending the request.  If they accessed your e-mail, I'd definitely recommend changing that.

As to League, I'd also recommend verifying your e-mail (which you can do via this handy link right [here](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect)!) which will help to protect your account if someone tries to gain access to it.  If that link doesn't work for some reason, our [support site FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751744-Email-Verification-FAQ) also has pictures which help walk you through the steps to verify your e-mail.
